name: Shooting God
description:
This is a tactical shooting decryption game that tests strategy. Players rely on strategic targeting techniques to knock down enemies hiding in every corner and obtain the final victory. Aim by holding down the left mouse button and release the left mouse button to fire a bullet. The bullet will hit the enemy through refraction and reflection. Defeating all enemies in the level can pass the level to get stars. When the bullet is consumed and the enemy has not fallen, the level will fail.
The fewer bullets consumed in the level, the higher the evaluation of the level.
The star rewards obtained can be used to unlock many western beauties in the gallery.
